channel.title: Error_game_crash
channel.description: I have heard it was a cache download link, couldn't find/fix this. I can't run any client with a run.bat, only .jar. This is very aggravating because I can't code this way. If you have a solution please, please reply. If you can, also dumb it down for me. Pic of error: http://gyazo.com/bf57a5107fcbd768931bfcc8f5622cc0

item.title: Error_game_crash
item.dc:creator: @i_dupe_alote i dupe alote
item.description:
@i_dupe_alote wrote:

Thank you very much Pure, it is now working. I just had to disable my AVG because it was freaking out.

Read full topic

item.title: Error_game_crash
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“i dupe alote, post:5, topic:540832”]I’ll transfer it over for you,
C;\users\largen\guardian718\guardian\live
Error: Class291.method2752:182 Class291.method2751:92 client.init:519 Loader.startClient:117 Loader.doFrame:52 Loader.main:36 Class52_sub2_sub1_sub1 java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run Java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged java.net.URLClassLOader.findClass Java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass Java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass more | java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Class52_sub2_sub1_sub1
Before I type more, is it that class52_sub2_sub1_sub1[/quote]Seems like it. Make sure it’s referenced properly.

Read full topic
